```{r}
incomes <- c(30,45,70,110,55)

raises <- 1.1*incomes
lowincome <- incomes < 70
incomes[lowincome] <- raises[lowincome]
incomes
```

```{r}

testTemp <- function(t) {
  if(t>120){
    cat("Too Hot!")
  }else{
    cat("Perfect")
  }
}

testTemp(80)
testTemp(200)

```

```{r}
t <- c(80,200)
testTemp(t)
```
